buyTicket().details: buy a lottery ticket with this function

calculateWinner(uint256,uint256).details: calculates the winner of the lottery

params.deadline: blocknumber at which lottery should be closed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payments(address).details: Returns the payments owed to an address.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPrice(uint256).details: allows owner of lottery to set price of the ticket

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawPayments(address).details: allows winner of current lottery to withdraw payment

params.payee: address of recipient to whom amount will be sent

buyTicket().notice: lottery has to be Active for people to be able to ticket
